# NDA Template

## Parties Involved
- [ ] Identify the parties entering the agreement.

## Definition of Confidential Information
- [ ] Clearly define what constitutes confidential information.

## Obligations of Receiving Party
- [ ] Outline the responsibilities of the receiving party.

## Term and Termination
- [ ] Define the duration of the agreement and conditions for termination.

## Governing Law
- [ ] Indicate the jurisdiction governing the agreement.
